dcterms:description: The ICDAR SigComp Dutch Dataset contains samples from 64 individuals, each with at least 24 genuine and 8 forged signatures for training, and 42 individuals with a minimum of 12 authentic and 12 forged signatures for testing.
dcterms:title: ICDAR SigComp Dutch Dataset

dcterms:creator: Subramaniam M
Teja E
Mathew A
dcterms:description: The CEDAR dataset comprises 1320 forgeries and 1320 genuine signatures from 55 writers, with 24 original signatures and 24 forgeries per writer, used for training and testing the model.
dcterms:title: CEDAR Dataset
